alert.note: Alert for Bell; Breathitt; Harlan; Knott; Leslie; Letcher; Owsley; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 11:54PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harlan, northeastern Bell, Letcher, east central Owsley, Leslie, Perry, Knott and southern Breathitt Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lucky Fork to near Wooton to Varilla. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hyden, Frew, Avawam, Wooton, Daley, Smilax, Toulouse, Dryhill, Cinda and Mosley Bend around 1200 AM EDT. Hazard, Diablock, Bush Branch, Gays Creek and Tacky Town around 1205 AM EDT. Wallins Creek, Jeff, Wolf Coal, Liggett, Altro, Whick, Barwick, Hensley Store, Viper and Little around 1210 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Harlan, Loyall, Vicco, Sassafras, Wiscoal, Ned, Anco, Peepace Store, Mary Alice, Martins Fork, Letcher, Blackey, Smithsboro, Cody, Rowdy, Carr Creek, Three Point, Dirk, Martins Fork Lake, Bobs Creek, Bath, Evarts, Cranks, Spider, Littcarr, Redfox, Amelia, Ary, Sackett, Noble, Hindman, Pippa Passes, Colson, Buck, May, Omaha, Nealy, Pine Top, Ivan and Drew. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Hal Rogers Parkway between mile markers 46 and 59. Kentucky Highway 80 in Knott County between mile markers 1 and 12. Kentucky Highway 80 in Perry County between mile markers 9 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for southeastern Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Bell; Breathitt; Harlan; Knott; Leslie; Letcher; Owsley; Perry
